nodes.text: The Arms Factory, located in the southeastern part of Foundry Four, was dedicated to producing a variety of starship weaponry. Once produced, large weapons were moved one at a time on specialized skiffs through the residential area of the foundry's northeastern area, which had the nearest landing shaft. One of four LAAT/c cargo carriers lifted the weapons to orbit, where the Ferra Sector Shipyard refitted civilian transports for combat. The factory also produced both light and medium turbolaser cannons, and had a dozen ready to mount on the Icarii-7.
The Arms Factory was introduced in the 2016 Fantasy Flight Games adventure book Friends Like These as part of the Star Wars: Age of Rebellion roleplaying game.
